entry.notes: Imported from Times Microwave Systems catalog

source_text:
Times Microwave Systems LMR-195
Model: LMR-195
Type: cable
0.195" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
Impedance: 50 ohms
Velocity: 83.0%
Attenuation at 50 MHz: 1.0 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 150 MHz: 1.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 220 MHz: 2.2 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 450 MHz: 3.3 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 900 MHz: 4.9 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1800 MHz: 7.5 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 1900 MHz: 7.8 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 2400 MHz: 9.0 dB/100ft
Attenuation at 5800 MHz: 15.0 dB/100ft

expected_json.description: 0.195" diameter flexible coaxial cable, PE jacket
expected_json.notes: Smallest LMR cable, very flexible but higher loss
